topic: Radiance and radmap installers for window$
body:
Hi all,


For the lazy window$ users out there, I have put together
a couple of setup programmes that should make it easier
to install non-visual Radiance programmes and radmap:


MinGW Radiance 3R8 setup:
http://www.bozzograo.net/radiancewiki/doku.php/windows_alternatives
(does not include rvu, ximage, etc.)


Radmap
http://www.bozzograo.net/radiancewiki/doku.php/radiance_based_software#radmap
(follow the link that redirects to the download page and get the 
package with the "new" tag)


Please post all your questions about radmap to the b/rad mailing list:
brad at nongnu.org


Ciao,


Francesco
___
